```java
package com.lizx.leetcode.L76;

import java.util.*;

public class Solution {
    public String minWindow(String s, String t) {
        if (t.length() > s.length())
            return "";

        Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < t.length(); i++) {
            char c = t.charAt(i);
            map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) + 1);
        }

        int minWindowLength = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
        int minWindowLeft = 0;
        int minWindoeRight = 0;

        Queue<Integer> effectiveIndex = new LinkedList<>();
        // 左闭右开
        int left = 0;
        int right = 0;
        while (right < s.length()) {
            // 先扩张
            while (right < s.length()) {
                if (t.indexOf(s.charAt(right)) != -1) {
                    effectiveIndex.add(right);
                    map.put(s.charAt(right), map.get(s.charAt(right)) - 1);
                }
                right++;
                if (contains(map))
                    break;
                else if (right == s.length())
                    return s.substring(minWindowLeft, minWindoeRight);
            }

            if (minWindowLength == Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                left = effectiveIndex.poll();

            if (right - left < minWindowLength) {
                minWindowLength = right - left;
                minWindowLeft = left;
                minWindoeRight = right;
            }

            // 再收缩
            while (!effectiveIndex.isEmpty()) {
                char c = s.charAt(left);
                map.put(c, map.get(c) + 1);

                left = effectiveIndex.poll();

                if (contains(map)) {
                    // 记录是否是最小窗口
                    if (right - left < minWindowLength) {
                        minWindowLength = right - left;
                        minWindowLeft = left;
                        minWindoeRight = right;
                    }
                } else {
                    // 退出准备扩张
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        return s.substring(minWindowLeft, minWindoeRight);
    }

    private boolean contains(Map<Character, Integer> map) {
        Collection<Integer> values = map.values();
        for (Integer value : values) {
            if (value > 0)
                return false;
        }
        return true;
    }

    private boolean contains1(String s, String t) {
        for (int i = 0; i < t.length(); i++) {
            int sIndex = s.indexOf(t.charAt(i));
            if (sIndex == -1)
                return false;
            s = s.substring(0, sIndex) + s.substring(sIndex + 1);
        }
        return true;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Solution solution = new Solution();
//        String s = solution.minWindow("ADOBECODEBANC", "ABC");
//        String s = solution.minWindow("a", "a");
        String s = solution.minWindow("ab", "a");
//        String s = solution.minWindow("a", "b");
//        String s = solution.minWindow("aa", "aa");
//        String param_s = "";
//        String param_t = "";
//        String s = solution.minWindow(param_s, param_t);
        System.out.println(s);
    }
}

```
